properties.entry: SELECT A.RNUM , A.ORDER_NO , A.ORDER_MEMBER_NO , A.ORDER_DATE , A.ORDER_TITLE , A.AMOUNT_PRICE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.ORDER_NO , B.ORDER_MEMBER_NO , B.ORDER_DATE , B.ORDER_TITLE , B.AMOUNT_PRICE FROM (SELECT A.ORDER_NO , A.ORDER_MEMBER_NO , A.ORDER_DATE , A.ORDER_TITLE , A.AMOUNT_PRICE FROM MG_ORDER A JOIN MG_MEMBER B ON (A.ORDER_MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO) ORDER BY A.ORDER_NO DESC ) B ) A WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MG_ORDER A WHERE A.ORDER_NO LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MG_ORDER A WHERE A.ORDER_MEMBER_NO LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MG_ORDER A WHERE A.ORDER_TITLE LIKE '%' || ? || '%'

SELECT A.RNUM , A.ORDER_NO , A.ORDER_MEMBER_NO , A.ORDER_DATE , A.ORDER_TITLE , A.AMOUNT_PRICE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.ORDER_NO , B.ORDER_MEMBER_NO , B.ORDER_DATE , B.ORDER_TITLE , B.AMOUNT_PRICE FROM (SELECT A.ORDER_NO , A.ORDER_MEMBER_NO , A.ORDER_DATE , A.ORDER_TITLE , A.AMOUNT_PRICE FROM MG_ORDER A JOIN MG_MEMBER B ON (A.ORDER_MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO) WHERE A.ORDER_NO LIKE ? ORDER BY A.ORDER_NO DESC ) B ) A WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT A.RNUM , A.ORDER_NO , A.ORDER_MEMBER_NO , A.ORDER_DATE , A.ORDER_TITLE , A.AMOUNT_PRICE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.ORDER_NO , B.ORDER_MEMBER_NO , B.ORDER_DATE , B.ORDER_TITLE , B.AMOUNT_PRICE FROM (SELECT A.ORDER_NO , A.ORDER_MEMBER_NO , A.ORDER_DATE , A.ORDER_TITLE , A.AMOUNT_PRICE FROM MG_ORDER A JOIN MG_MEMBER B ON (A.ORDER_MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO) WHERE A.ORDER_MEMBER_NO LIKE ? ORDER BY A.ORDER_NO DESC ) B ) A WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT A.RNUM , A.ORDER_NO , A.ORDER_MEMBER_NO , A.ORDER_DATE , A.ORDER_TITLE , A.AMOUNT_PRICE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.ORDER_NO , B.ORDER_MEMBER_NO , B.ORDER_DATE , B.ORDER_TITLE , B.AMOUNT_PRICE FROM (SELECT A.ORDER_NO , A.ORDER_MEMBER_NO , A.ORDER_DATE , A.ORDER_TITLE , A.AMOUNT_PRICE FROM MG_ORDER A JOIN MG_MEMBER B ON (A.ORDER_MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO) WHERE A.ORDER_TITLE LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ORDER BY A.ORDER_NO DESC ) B ) A WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
